summary: REQ-2 and REQ-3 appear to be implemented in DashboardPage via opening QuizDialog for the 'quiz' carousel item and navigating to /pre-meditation with a validated `type` search param on quiz completion. REQ-1 is implemented structurally (switch to icons), but the asset paths used include a leading `/` for all icons, which may not match the exact paths requested for mindfulness/ifs/metta.

missing_requirements.requirement: Use the exact asset paths provided for ritual meditation type icons: mindfulness -> assets/mindfulness.png, ifs -> assets/ifs.png, metta -> assets/meta.png, visualization -> /assets/visualization.png.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff uses `/assets/...` (leading slash) for mindfulness/metta/ifs as well, which does not match the exact paths listed in the BuildRequest for those three types.

hallucinated_features.description: Large-scale styling/theme and Tailwind token changes (OKLCH color system, new animations/shadows/fonts).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by any REQ; BuildRequest explicitly scoped changes to icon swap in rituals UI and quiz launch/navigation behavior.

hallucinated_features.description: Landing page behavior change to auto-redirect authenticated users to dashboard.
Floating navigation redesign/behavior updates (drifting icons, labels on hover, new routes like Knowledge).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; also BuildRequest non-goal says not to redesign the entire dashboard carousel UI beyond quiz-trigger and icon swap, and does not request nav changes.

hallucinated_features.description: Changes to JournalPage (imports/exports, guest-mode favorite toggling, editing flows, etc.).
Changes to queries hook behavior (ritual deletion passing timestamp and toast notifications).
Changes to ActiveMeditationPage and other meditation UI components (timer/breathing animation, ambient music carousel updates, lotus canvas variants).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by any REQ (and BuildRequest non-goals discourage unrelated meditation content/guide changes except URL param navigation).
